languages.text: Рассадник заразы изолирован, среди колонистов введены регулярные проверки здоровья. Эти меры позволили побороть вспышку заразы.
The hotbed of the infection was isolated, and regular health checks of the populace were enforced. These steps allowed the colony to put a stop to the outbreak.
languages.original_text: Рассадник заразы изолирован, среди колонистов введены регулярные проверки здоровья. Эти меры позволили побороть вспышку заразы.

traits.locale_text: The cesspool of the infection was isolated, and regular health checks of the populace were enforced. These steps allowed the colony to put a stop to the outbreak.
The cesspool of the infection was isolated, and regular health checks of the populace were enforced. These steps allowed the colony to put a stop to the outbreak.
The hotbed of the infection was isolated, and regular health checks of the populace were enforced. These steps allowed the colony to put a stop to the outbreak.
The hotbed of the infection was isolated, and regular health checks of the populace were enforced. These steps allowed the colony to put a stop to the outbreak.
The hotbed of the infection was isolated, and regular health checks of the populace were enforced. These steps allowed the colony to put a stop to the outbreak.

languages.text: El hervidero de contagios ha sido aislado y se han impuesto controles de salud regulares entre la población. Estas medidas han permitido a la colonia contener el brote.
languages.original_text: The hotbed of the infection was isolated, and regular health checks of the populace were enforced. These steps allowed the colony to put a stop to the outbreak.

traits.locale_text: El hervidero de contagios ha sido aislado y se han impuesto controles de salud regulares entre la población. Estas medidas han permitido a la colonia contener el brote.

languages.text: Le foyer d'infection a été isolé et un suivi médical régulier de la population a été mis en place. Ces mesures ont permis d'endiguer l'épidémie.
languages.original_text: The hotbed of the infection was isolated, and regular health checks of the populace were enforced. These steps allowed the colony to put a stop to the outbreak.

traits.locale_text: Le foyer d'infection a été isolé et un suivi médical régulier de la population a été mis en place. Ces mesures ont permis d'endiguer l'épidémie.

languages.text: 行商浪人下令阻绝传染病的温床，对当地民众进行定期体检。这些措施阻止了疫情进一步爆发。
languages.original_text: The hotbed of the infection was isolated, and regular health checks of the populace were enforced. These steps allowed the colony to put a stop to the outbreak.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人下令阻绝传染病的温床，对当地民众进行定期体检。这些措施阻止了疫情进一步爆发。

languages.text: 感染の温床は隔離され、住民の定期的な健康チェックが実施された。これらの措置により、コロニーは疫病の大流行を食い止めることができた。
languages.original_text: The hotbed of the infection was isolated, and regular health checks of the populace were enforced. These steps allowed the colony to put a stop to the outbreak.

traits.locale_text: 感染の温床は隔離され、住民の定期的な健康チェックが実施された。これらの措置により、コロニーは疫病の大流行を食い止めることができた。

languages.text: Das Epizentrum der Infektion wurde isoliert, regelmäßige Untersuchungen der Bevölkerung wurden vorgeschrieben. Durch diese Maßnahmen konnte die Kolonie den Ausbruch eindämmen.
languages.original_text: The hotbed of the infection was isolated, and regular health checks of the populace were enforced. These steps allowed the colony to put a stop to the outbreak.

traits.locale_text: Das Epizentrum der Infektion wurde isoliert, regelmäßige Untersuchungen der Bevölkerung wurden vorgeschrieben. Durch diese Maßnahmen konnte die Kolonie den Ausbruch eindämmen.

languages.text: Enfeksiyonun yuvası tecrit edildi ve düzenli sağlık kontrolleri zorunlu kılındı. Bu adımlar sayesinde kolonide patlak veren salgının yayılması önlendi.
languages.original_text: The hotbed of the infection was isolated, and regular health checks of the populace were enforced. These steps allowed the colony to put a stop to the outbreak.
